name: TwitchTV Lights Out [NEW]
description: Sucks 90% of the purple right out. Also removes ads and promo junk. Requires dark mode to be enabled.
additional_info: *** MUST ENABLE DARK THEME TOGGLE IN TOP RIGHT USER DROPDOWN MENU *** [NOTE] * Twitch prime/turbo/bits removed by default; remove lines under related comments near bottom to undo. * An option to remove chat emotes is commented out near the bottom. [RECOMMENDED] Hide unwanted streams on Twitch - (Github) AHK script to play stream url copied to clipboard using Streamlink - (Script) | (Streamlink) [THANKS] (Review this style) BTC: 1MzLRegFHqum4S6PWHbuD1m3fadxn9R1Zy
